Anime.title: No Game No Life

Anime.title: Magi

Black Stories.title: Orange Is the New Black

Black Stories.title: Trigger Warning with Killer Mike

Black Stories.title: Dave Chappelle

Black Stories.title: Eddie Murphy: Delirious

Black Stories.title: Katt Williams: Great America

Black Stories.title: Leslie Jones: Time Machine

Black Stories.title: Chris Tucker Live

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Dave Chappelle

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Felipe Esparza: Bad Decisions

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Tom Papa: You're Doing Great!
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Comedian Tom Papa takes on body image issues, social media, pets, Staten Island, the "old days" and more in a special from his home state of New Jersey.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Tom Segura: Mostly Stories
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: The bearded, bawdy and comically bitter Tom Segura gets real about body piercings, the "Area 51" of men's bodies, and the lie he told Mike Tyson.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Historical Roasts
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: "Roastmaster General" Jeff Ross and a slew of guest stars poke fun at major historical figures while also honoring their enduring impact on the world.
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.starring: Jeff Ross, Bob Saget, James Adomian

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Chelsea
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: It's not her first talk show, but it is a first of its kind. Ideas, people and places that fascinate her, all in her unique style.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Jim Gaffigan: Mr. Universe
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Funnyman Jim Gaffigan offers up his unique take on everything from Disney World to overweight whales in this live show from Washington, D.C.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Tom Segura: Disgraceful
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Tom Segura gives voice to the sordid thoughts you'd never say out loud, with blunt musings on porn, parking lot power struggles, parenthood and more.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Katt Williams: Great America
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: The King of underground comedy delivers unflinching riffs on the American political climate, racial tensions, sex and his disdain for roast beef.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: The Degenerates
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Six stand-ups explore the coarse and salacious side of comedy in this series of half-hour specials. For mature audiences.
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.starring: Brad Williams, Christina Pazsitzky, Big Jay Oakerson

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Gabriel "Fluffy" Iglesias: One Show Fits All
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Gabriel "Fluffy" Iglesias discusses his teenage son and encounters with Snoop Dogg, Chris Rock and Vicente Fernández in this stand-up special for 2019.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Chris Rock: Tamborine
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Chris Rock takes the stage in Brooklyn for a comedy special filled with searing observations on fatherhood, infidelity and American politics.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Sarah Silverman A Speck of Dust
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: In her first comedy special post-health scare, Sarah Silverman shares a mix of fun facts, sad truths and yeah-she-just-went-there moments.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Amy Schumer Growing
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Amy Schumer spills on her new marriage, personal growth, making a baby and her mom's misguided advice in a special that's both raunchy and sincere.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Joe Rogan: Triggered
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Unleashing his inquisitive, intense comedic style, Rogan explores everything from raising kids and Santa Claus to pot gummies and talking to dolphins.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Wanda Sykes: Not Normal
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Wanda Sykes tackles politics, reality TV, racism and the secret she'd take to the grave in this rollicking, no-holds-barred stand-up special.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Patton Oswalt: Talking for Clapping
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: On stage in San Francisco, the comedian covers topics like old people getting drugs, his worst stand-up set, gay proms and a horrible birthday clown.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: David Batra: Elefanten i rummet
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Swedish comedian David Batra gets personal as he playfully details the perks and pitfalls of being married to a recently resigned political leader.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Colin Quinn: Unconstitutional
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: New York comedian Colin Quinn writes and stars in this live one-man stage show that dissects and deconstructs U.S. constitutional history.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Colin Quinn: Red State Blue State
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Stand-up comedian Colin Quinn calls out the hypocrisies of the left and the right in this special based on his politically charged Off-Broadway show.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Craig Ferguson: Tickle Fight
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Cheeky comic Craig Ferguson keeps it casual as he discusses '70s porn, Japanese toilets and his mildly crime-filled days as a talk show host.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Jim Jefferies: This Is Me Now
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: The gleefully irreverent Jefferies skewers "grabby" celebrities, political hypocrisy and his own ill-advised career moves in a brash stand-up special.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Patton Oswalt: Annihilation
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: By turns scathing and candid, Patton Oswalt reflects on the glut of comic material in the Trump era and the dark days following a personal tragedy.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Dana Carvey: Straight White Male, 60
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Emmy-winning comedian Dana Carvey blends pitch-perfect takes on big personalities with so-true-it-hurts stories from his life as a dad of millennials.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Hari Kondabolu: Warn Your Relatives
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Hari Kondabolu breaks down identity politics, celebrity encounters, his mango obsession and more in an unpredictable stand-up comedy special.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: W. Kamau Bell: Private School Negro
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Comedian W. Kamau Bell muses on parenting in the Trump era, "free speech" dustups, woke children's TV and his fear of going off the grid.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: David Cross: Making America Great Again!
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Cross skewers Donald Trump, religious taboos and American swagger in a provocative night of comedy at the Paramount Theatre in Austin, Texas.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Maz Jobrani: Immigrant
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Iranian American comic Maz Jobrani lights up the Kennedy Center with riffs on immigrant life in the Trump era, modern parenting pitfalls and more.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Bill Burr: Walk Your Way Out
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: No-nonsense comic Bill Burr takes the stage in Nashville and riffs on fast food, overpopulation, dictators and gorilla sign language.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Russell Howard: Recalibrate
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Self-deprecating comic Russell Howard plows ahead through politics, porn, social media and his own shortcomings. Yet he somehow keeps it positive.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Katt Williams: The Pimp Chronicles: Pt. 1
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: In this 2006 show, comic Katt Williams uses his edgy style and personal experiences to paint a sassy, hilarious portrait of life in black America.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Bill Hicks: Sane Man
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Filmed in 1989 at a turning point in comedian Bill Hicks's career, this rare onstage performance captures him spouting off on a variety of topics.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: RUSSELL BRAND: RE:BIRTH
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Russell Brand gets loquacious in London as he ruminates on the state of the world and marvels over how his life changed the moment he became a father.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Bill Hicks: Revelations
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: In his final recorded special, the iconoclastic comedian channels Goat Boy and tackles provocative topics like British porn, pot and the priesthood.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Jeff Dunham: Controlled Chaos
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Politically incorrect and often raunchy humor pepper ventriloquist Dunham's live concert performance featuring characters Walter, Achmed and Peanut.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Lavell Crawford: Can a Brother Get Some Love?
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: "Last Comic Standing" runner-up Lavell Crawford lords over a hometown crowd at St. Louis's Orpheum Theatre, raking in the love -- and the laughs.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Jeff Dunham: Beside Himself
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Jeff Dunham takes the stage in Dallas with his old pals Peanut, Walter, José Jalapeño, Bubba J and Achmed to poke fun at himself and American culture.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Bill Hicks: Relentless
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: In one of his most iconic performances, late comedian Bill Hicks demonstrates what made him such a singular talent and a force to be reckoned with.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Cedric the Entertainer: Live from the Ville
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Donning his signature suit and fedora, the dapper comic offers a unique spin on getting old, the presidential election and "Honky Tonk Badonkadonk."

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Jeff Dunham: Relative Disaster
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Ventriloquist Jeff Dunham brings his rude and slightly demented posse of puppets to Ireland for a gleeful skewering of family and politics.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Lucas Brothers: On Drugs
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Deadpan twin comics Keith and Kenny Lucas take the stage in Brooklyn with a set that touches on drugs, race, Deion Sanders, teachers and O.J. Simpson.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Jeff Dunham: Unhinged in Hollywood
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Unfiltered ventriloquist Jeff Dunham brings his ragtag crew of puppet pals to Hollywood for big laughs about celebrity culture and California living.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: D.L. Hughley: Contrarian
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: D.L. Hughley riffs on hot-button political issues, celebrity scandals, his mother's tough love and more in a rapid-fire stand-up show in Philadelphia.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Vir Das: For India
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: From the Vedas to Vasco da Gama to vacuous Bollywood plotlines, comedian Vir Das celebrates the history of India with his one-of-a-kind perspective.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Carlos Ballarta: Furia Ñera
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Mexican comic Carlos Ballarta mocks himself and points out the absurdities of parenthood and how he uses his wife's pregnancies to avoid commitments.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Francesco De Carlo: Cose di questo mondo
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Taking the stage in Milan, Francesco De Carlo opens up about his bad habits, religion, politics and what he's learned from traveling the world.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Dieter Nuhr: Nuhr in Berlin
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: The cerebral and popular German cabaret comic expounds his theories on gender norms, primal instincts and a decidedly gastrointestinal Big Bang.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Trigger Warning with Killer Mike
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: In this funny and provocative series, rapper and activist Killer Mike puts his revolutionary ideas about achieving social change into action.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Mike Birbiglia: The New One
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Comedian Mike Birbiglia hits Broadway with a hilarious yet profound one-man show that recounts his emotional and physical journey to parenthood.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Mike Birbiglia: What I Should Have Said Was Nothing: Tales from My Secret Public Journal
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Mike Birbiglia performs in this live concert special that features a riotous selection of the unique insights and observations culled from his diary.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: John Leguizamo's Latin History for Morons
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: In this one-man Broadway show, John Leguizamo finds humor and heartbreak as he traces 3,000 years of Latin history in an effort to help his bullied son.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Mike Birbiglia: Thank God for Jokes
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Comedian Mike Birbiglia takes the stage in Brooklyn and hits on hard truths about puppets, late people and the very real dangers of being funny.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Alex Fernández: The Best Comedian in the World
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Comic Alex Fernández performs his familiar autobiographical stories but goes a little deeper this time with a tender tale about one of his six siblings.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Neal Brennan: 3 Mics
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Wicked one-liners and soul-baring confessions converge in this uniquely intimate stand-up special from "Chappelle's Show" co-creator Neal Brennan.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Mike Birbiglia: My Girlfriend's Boyfriend
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: On this painfully honest but hilarious journey, Birbiglia struggles to find reason in an area where it may be impossible to find: love.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Ellen DeGeneres: Relatable
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: In her first special since 2003, Ellen revisits her road to stardom and details the heartfelt -- and hilarious -- lessons she's learned along the way.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Cristela Alonzo: Lower Classy
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: The irrepressible Alonzo skewers Latino stereotypes, pricey luxuries and her mother's tough-love parenting in a night of sly and infectious comedy.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Kevin Hart: Laugh at My Pain
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Sometimes edgy and always hilarious, comedian Kevin Hart shines in this theatrical version of his record-breaking 2011 live tour.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Yours Sincerely, Kanan Gill
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Revisiting life goals set in a letter written as a teen to his future self, comedian Kanan Gill reports back on if he's lived up to his own expectations.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Katherine Ryan: Glitter Room
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Fresh from a tour, comedian Katherine Ryan shares shrewd observations about school bullies, revenge bodies and raising a very fancy child.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Garfunkel and Oates: Trying to be Special
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Garfunkel and Oates put on a surprise-filled show in Seattle in hopes of raising enough money to make their own comedy special.
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.starring: Riki Lindhome, Kate Micucci, Anthony Jeselnik

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Jenny Slate: Stage Fright
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Jenny Slate's first stand-up special is a mix of stage time, funny stories about adulthood and conversations with family in her childhood home.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Amy Schumer: The Leather Special
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Comic sensation Amy Schumer riffs on sex, dating and the absurdities of fame in a bold and uncensored stand-up set at Denver's Bellco Theater.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Maria Bamford: Old Baby
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Maria Bamford performs a rapid-fire, playful stand-up set for crowds at park benches, bowling alleys and LA theaters in this roving comedy special.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Hannah Gadsby: Douglas
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Hannah Gadsby returns for her second special and digs deep into the complexities of popularity, identity and her most unusual dog park encounter.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Nate Bargatze: The Tennessee Kid
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Comic Nate Bargatze touches on air travel, cheap weddings, college football, chocolate milk and the perils of ordering coffee in this stand-up special.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Jack Whitehall: I'm Only Joking
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Jack Whitehall hits the stage with hilarious tales about happy couples, life in hotels, human stupidity and his well-traveled father.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Bill Burr: Paper Tiger
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Bill Burr unloads on outrage culture, male feminism, cultural appropriation, robot sex and more in a blistering stand-up special shot in London.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Ken Jeong: You Complete Me, Ho
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: In his first-ever stand-up special, Ken Jeong pays tribute to his wife and shares stories about Hollywood and how "The Hangover" saved his life.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Steve Martin and Martin Short: An Evening You Will Forget for the Rest of Your Life
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Longtime pals and showbiz icons Steve Martin and Martin Short share countless quips, catchy tunes and hilarious stories about their lives in comedy.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Kevin James: Never Don't Give Up
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Kevin James makes his long-awaited return to stand-up in this family-friendly special, dishing on fatherhood, fans, his disdain for allergies and more.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Jo Koy: In His Elements
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Jo Koy brings the laughs and beats to Manila, spotlighting local culture in a one-of-a-kind show featuring Filipino American comedians, DJs and B-boys.
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.starring: Jo Koy, Andrew Lopez, Joey Guila

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Kevin James: Sweat the Small Stuff
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: The film and television star riffs on life's many royal pains in this hourlong special taped at New York City's Hudson Theatre in 2001.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Aditi Mittal: Things They Wouldn't Let Me Say
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Trailblazing comic Aditi Mittal mixes topical stand-up with frank talk about being single, wearing thongs and the awkwardness of Indian movie ratings.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Harith Iskander: I Told You So
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Malaysian stand-up comedy icon Harith Iskander takes the stage in Kuala Lumpur to talk about Singapore, a past girlfriend, Rick Astley and more.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Agustín Aristarán: Soy Rada
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Argentine comedian Agustín Aristarán adds doses of magic, music and acting to his high-energy stand-up routine.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: The Honeymoon Stand Up Special
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Impending parenthood does funny things to Natasha Leggero and Moshe Kasher, who dissect family, relationships and more in a trio of stand-up specials.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Fary: Hexagone
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: French comedy phenom Fary puts a playful spin on questions of identity, culture, patriotism and more in a wide-ranging, two-part stand-up special.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Katarzyna Piasecka, Rafał Pacześ Seriously Funny
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Polish comedians Rafał Pacześ and Katarzyna Piasecka hit the stage at Warsaw's Klub Hybrydy for a night of funny anecdotes and sly jokes.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Tomasz Jachimek, Jacek Stramik Laugh at Live
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Writer, actor and satirist Tomasz Jachimek teams up with comedian Jacek Stramik for a night of subversive stand-up at Klub Hybrydy in Warsaw.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Mariusz Kałamaga, Karol Kopiec, Wiolka Walaszczyk Hilarious Trio
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Comedians Mariusz Kałamaga, Karol Kopiec and Wiolka Walaszczyk deliver an eclectic and energetic stand-up show at Klub Hybrydy in Warsaw.
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.starring: Mariusz Kałamaga, Karol Kopiec, Wiolka Walaszczyk

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Karol Modzelewski, Łukasz „Lotek” Lodkowski No Offense
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Charismatic comedy pals Karol Modzelewski and Łukasz "Lotek" Lodkowski bring their mischievous brand of humor to Warsaw's Klub Hybrydy.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Rafał Banaś, Michał Leja Laugh out Loud
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Young Polish comedians Rafał Banaś and Michał Leja present a high-energy stand-up show at Warsaw's Klub Hybrydy.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: The Best of Rafał Rutkowski Olka Szczęśniak
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: "Recipe for Life" star Rafał Rutkowski and Comedy Lab's Olka Szczęśniak serve up humorous impressions and wry wit at Warsaw's Klub Hybrydy.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Fortune Feimster: Sweet & Salty
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Actor, comedian and writer Fortune Feimster takes the stage and riffs on her southern roots, sexual awakenings, showbiz career and more.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Joe Rogan: Strange Times
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Outspoken as ever, comedian Joe Rogan takes on current culture, pro wrestling, pot laws, cats, vegans and more in a stand-up special shot in Boston.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Chelsea Peretti: One of the Greats
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: "Brooklyn Nine-Nine" star Chelsea Peretti showcases her diverse talents in this dark yet silly reimagining of the comedy special.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Brian Regan: Nunchucks and Flamethrowers
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Brian Regan takes relatable family humor to new heights as he talks board games, underwear elastic and looking for hot dogs in all the wrong places.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: The Break with Michelle Wolf
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Nobody's safe as Michelle Wolf unapologetically takes aim in this weekly topical show that blends sketches with live comedy and in-studio guests.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Beyond Stranger Things
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Secrets from the "Stranger Things 2" universe are revealed as cast and guests discuss the latest episodes with host Jim Rash. Caution: spoilers ahead!
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.starring: Jim Rash, Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Stand Up and Away! with Brian Regan
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Brian Regan blends his trademark observational stand-up with short sketches and a bit of audience interaction in this hybrid comedy series.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Michael Che Matters
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: "SNL" star Michael Che takes on hot-button topics like inequality, homophobia and gentrification in this stand-up set filmed live in Brooklyn.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Kevin Hart: Irresponsible
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: As a father of three on his second marriage, Kevin Hart proves that being him is indeed a tall order in a fresh special inspired by his own mistakes.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Richard Pryor: Live in Concert
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Richard Pryor's classic 1979 concert film has him discussing a wide range of topics, including race, the police and his favorite target -- himself.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Gina Yashere: Laughing to America
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: British comic Gina Yashere takes the stage in San Francisco, where she shares her thoughts on everything from toilet ninjas to her troublesome name.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: David A. Arnold: Fat Ballerina
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Finally comfortable in his skin, seasoned comic David A. Arnold shares his talent for doing nothing, how he's petty and why divorce saves marriages.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Hannibal Buress: Comedy Camisado
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: In a special packed with stealthy humor, Hannibal Buress tackles zipper etiquette, the legacy of steroids and the fallout from his Bill Cosby routine.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Tiffany Haddish: She Ready! From the Hood To Hollywood!
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Comedic breakout Tiffany Haddish delivers a riotous stand-up ripe with the unpretentious and filthy tales of her meteoric rise to stardom.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Katt Williams: Kattpacalypse
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Urban comic Katt Williams ushers in Kattpacalypse, exploding with more energy than an atomic bomb and riffing on everything from Doomsday to Obama.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Deon Cole: Cole Hearted
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Embracing his belief that comedy is the last raw form of expression, Deon Cole explains the right time to thank Jesus and the wrong time to say "welp."

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Kevin Hart: What Now?
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Frenetic comic Kevin Hart hits Philadelphia and dishes on suburban wildlife, jean shorts and the fine art of getting even with a 7-year-old.
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.starring: Kevin Hart, Don Cheadle, Halle Berry

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Leslie Jones: Time Machine
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: From trying to seduce Prince to battling sleep apnea, Leslie Jones traces her evolution as an adult in a joyfully raw and outrageous stand-up special.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Chris Tucker Live
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Filmed in his hometown of Atlanta, Chris Tucker showcases his stand-up comedic chops as he shares his experiences from childhood to the big time.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Mo Gilligan: Momentum
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Comedian Mo Gilligan blends smooth moves and sharp humor as he riffs on humble beginnings, family dynamics and the complex art of dancing in the club.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Tiffany Haddish: Black Mitzvah
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: On her 40th birthday, Tiffany Haddish drops a bombastic special studded with singing, dancing and raunchy reflections on her long road to womanhood.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Gina Yashere: Skinny B*tch
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Standup comedian and "Daily Show" correspondent Gina Yashere delivers a sharp set of wry observations on the environment, money and more.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Marlon Wayans: Woke-ish
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Rollicking, outrageous and audacious, Marlon Wayans gets raw on racism, age-appropriate rap rhymes, gay rights, raising kids and even the Kardashians.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Katt Williams: Live
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Outspoken comedian Katt Williams pokes fun at a variety of topics, including sex, relationships, parenthood and trying to make it as an entertainer.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Katt Williams: American Hustle (The Movie)
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: An aspiring actor leaves Hollywood and takes to the road to do stand-up after he's cast in a series of increasingly stereotypical "black" roles.
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.starring: Katt Williams, Da Brat, Snoop Dogg

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Mike Epps: Only One Mike
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: In a raw stand-up comedy special, Mike Epps mixes it up as he tackles sexual misconduct, special ed, aging body parts and much more.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Tracy Morgan: Staying Alive
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: In his first special since his serious car accident, Tracy Morgan cracks jokes about life in a coma, his second marriage and his family's dark side.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Fary Is the New Black
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Armed with sly wit, a fresh outlook and plenty of style, French comedy star Fary veers from dating to stereotypes and beyond in this exclusive special.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: D.L. Hughley: Clear
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: In this 2014 standup special filmed in San Francisco, comedic genius D.L. Hughley entertains with his hilarious take on current affairs and more.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: DeRay Davis: How to Act Black
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Dynamic comic DeRay Davis hits the stage like a ball of fire, nailing the finer points of living, dating and handling show business as a Black man.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Arsenio Hall: Smart & Classy
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: In his first stand-up special, Arsenio Hall discusses getting older, the changing times and culture, social issues and even bothersome baby toes.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Sommore: The Reign Continues
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Self-proclaimed "Queen of Comedy" Sommore storms the stage to deliver a riotous stand-up performance in Charlotte, North Carolina.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Greg Davies: You Magnificent Beast
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: British comedian Greg Davies revisits terrifying dates, manscaping disasters, his father's pranks and more in a savagely funny stand-up special.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Jimmy Carr: Funny Business
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: British comedian Jimmy Carr unleashes his deadpan delivery and wickedly funny one-liners to a sold-out audience at the UK's Hammersmith Apollo.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Bridget Christie: Stand Up for Her
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Performing stand-up for a packed house in London's Hoxton Hall, comedian Bridget Christie dives into the politics of gender, sex and equality.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Jimmy Carr: The Best of Ultimate Gold Greatest Hits
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Nothing is off limits as Jimmy Carr serves up the most outrageous jokes from his stand-up career in a special that's not for the faint of heart.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Tim Minchin And The Heritage Orchestra Live
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Flanked by a full orchestra, Tim Minchin takes the Royal Albert Hall by storm with a wonderfully witty evening of satirical musical comedy.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Tim Minchin: So F**king Rock
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Comedic pianist Tim Minchin performs a host of his catchy songs that touch on everything from the Middle East to the healing power of canvas bags.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Simon Amstell: Set Free
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Honest, introspective comic Simon Amstell digs deep and delivers a uniquely vulnerable stand-up set on love, ego, intimacy and ayahuasca.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Jack Whitehall: Christmas with My Father
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Jack Whitehall invites his notoriously stuffy father onstage in London's West End for a Christmas comedy extravaganza, complete with celebrity guests.
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.starring: Jack Whitehall, Michael Whitehall, Hugh Bonneville

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: COMEDIANS of the world
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: A diverse set of 47 comedians from 13 regions bring their perspective on what's funny around the world. Browse and discover by selecting "Episodes."
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.starring: Neal Brennan, Chris D'Elia, Nicole Byer

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Bumping Mics with Jeff Ross & Dave Attell
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: When Jeff Ross and Dave Attell take the stage, no one is safe. With the help of special guests, they're packing a lot of laughs into one epic weekend.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Zona Rosa
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: An assortment of talent takes the stage for a night of honest stand-up featuring four of Mexico's funniest LGBTQ comedians.
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.starring: Manu NNa, Ana Julia Yeyé, Ray Contreras

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: A Little Help with Carol Burnett
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Comedy icon Carol Burnett returns to TV with a panel of clever kids, who help adults and celebrity guests solve their problems with brutal honesty.
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.starring: Carol Burnett, Russell Peters, Mark Cuban

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Ladies Up
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Rising India-based comics Prashasti Singh, Kaneez Surka, Supriya Joshi and Niveditha Prakasam bring no-holds-barred humor to this stand-up series.
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.starring: Prashasti Singh, Kaneez Surka, Niveditha Prakasam

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Cheuk Wan-Chi: Two Night Stand
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Writer and stand-up comedian Cheuk Wan-chi cracks wise at the follies of single womanhood and takes on politics in Hong Kong with nuance and flair.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Lugar de Mulher
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Four comedians from Brazil riff on sexuality, politics, religion and motherhood -- and set out to prove a woman's place is anywhere she wants it to be.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Midnight Misadventures with Mallika Dua
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: In this talk show, comedian Mallika Dua serves up big laughs as Shalishka and whips up a meal with her celebrity pals who dish on their diets and lives.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Felipe Esparza: They're Not Going to Laugh at You
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: "Last Comic Standing" winner Felipe Esparza runs riot in his first comedy special with his wry comments on life as a wild man from East Los Angeles.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Anjelah Johnson: Not Fancy
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: The actress, comedian and YouTube sensation riffs on everything from nail salons and Gypsies to Mexican moms and super-sleuthing Liam Neeson.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Gabriel lglesias: I’m Sorry For What I Said When I Was Hungry
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Hawaiian-shirt enthusiast Gabriel "Fluffy" Iglesias finds the laughs in racist gift baskets, Prius-driving cops and all-female taco trucks.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: George Lopez: We'll Do It For Half
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Comedian George Lopez tackles the future and the past of Latinx culture in America, touching on immigration, his tough relatives, aging and much more.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Jim Gaffigan: King Baby
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Jim Gaffigan offers up his take on bacon, bowling and other weighty topics in this stand-up performance filmed live in Austin on his 2008 comedy tour.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Jim Gaffigan: Cinco
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: America's king of clean comedy delivers wickedly funny jokes in his fifth hour-long special.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Jim Gaffigan: Obsessed
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Comic Jim Gaffigan delivers his sardonic take on topics like eating, exercise, weddings and his five kids in this live stand-up special.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Jim Gaffigan: Beyond the Pale
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Comedian Jim Gaffigan cuts loose on a variety of topics, including Hot Pockets, holidays, Catholicism and his favorite activity: doing nothing.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Tom Papa Live in New York City
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Comedian Tom Papa riffs on the trials of married life, fatherhood in the 21st century, domestic pets and more in his stand-up show.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Franco Escamilla: Por la anécdota
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Mexican stand-up comedian Franco Escamilla draws his jokes from real-life experiences -- and he's willing to do anything for new material.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Sofía Niño de Rivera: Exposed
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Self-deprecating comic Sofía Niño de Rivera puts her sarcasm on full display in this stand-up special filmed live at Guadalajara's Degollado Theater.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Franco Escamilla: Bienvenido al mundo
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Comedian Franco Escamilla shares stories about parenting his children when they get into trouble, with reflections on gender, friendship and romance.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Sofía Niño de Rivera: Selección Natural
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Mexico's Sofía Niño de Rivera brings her dark humor to the stage with jokes about marriage traps, sexually attractive leopards and funny funerals.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Gad Gone Wild
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: French comic Gad Elmaleh regales a Montreal crowd with tales of awkward mix-ups and baffling customs he's encountered since moving to the U.S.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Kenny Sebastian: The Most Interesting Person in the Room
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Fusing his musical and stand-up chops, Kenny Sebastian gets analytical about frumpy footwear, flightless birds and his fear of not being funny enough.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Alejandro Riaño: Especial de stand up
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Colombian comedian Alejandro Riaño discusses the perks of dating a she-wolf, styles of dancing, the quirks of Bogotá men and soccer game announcers.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Malena Pichot: Estupidez compleja
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: An Argentine comedian espouses the values of feminism, speaking on topics like sex, language, abortion and why it's OK to let a man buy you dinner.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Kavin Jay: Everybody Calm Down!
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: On a mission to defy stereotypes, Malaysian stand-up comedian Kavin Jay shares stories about growing up in the VHS era with his Singapore audience.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: El Especial de Alex Fernández, el Especial
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: From a Mexico City theme park, energetic stand-up Alex Fernández riffs on music, cheap toys, insecurity and other fun things about growing up.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Carlos Ballarta: El amor es de putos
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Carlos Ballarta mocks daily life in Mexico, including public transit, the education system and the corn seller who betrays your confidence.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Tumi or not Tumi
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Tumi Morake dishes out hot takes and fiery commentary about the concept of identity, politics, family life, weaves, and more in this stand-up special.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Whindersson Nunes: Adult
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Brazilian YouTube sensation Whindersson Nunes revisits his humble beginnings and much more in a series of playful stories and peculiar songs.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Dany Boon: Des Hauts De France
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: In an eclectic one-man show, French superstar Dany Boon reflects on his homeland, his first comedy gig and the challenges of parenting hostile teens.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Maurício Meirelles: Generating Chaos
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Comedian Maurício Meirelles explores his chaotic mind with scathingly funny views on family, prejudices, turtles and more in this stand-up special.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Mau Nieto: Viviendo sobrio… desde el bar
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Performing at a bar, Mexican stand-up comedian Mau Nieto dishes on his modest upbringing, his failed relationships and his attempts to stay sober.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Natalia Valdebenito: Gritona
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Chile's Natalia Valdebenito hits Santiago's Teatro Caupolicán with a one-woman show steeped in irony, a dash of improv and her own personal style.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Daniel Sosa: Maleducado
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: In his second stand-up special, Daniel Sosa reminisces about his childhood, ponders Mexican traditions and points out a major problem with "Coco."

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Joaquín Reyes: Una y no más
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Comedian and celebrity impersonator Joaquín Reyes decides to be his zesty self for a night of stories about buses, bathroom habits, royalty and more.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Sebastián Marcelo Wainraich
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Argentine comedian Sebastián Wainraich highlights the comedy in everyday life, from minibars to reasons why funerals are better than weddings.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Ricardo O'Farrill Abrazo Genial
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Ricardo O'Farrill brings his sharp, observational humor to the stage with a relentless sarcasm and specific Mexican sensibility. Prepare for mockery.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Liss Pereira: Reteniendo líquidos
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: A pregnant Liss Pereira shares hilariously uncomfortable truths about sex, love, attraction and the lies we tell in modern relationships.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Alan Saldaña: Mi vida de pobre
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Mexican comic Alan Saldaña has fun with everything from the pressure of sitting in an exit row to maxing out his credit card in this stand-up special.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Park Na-rae: Glamour Warning
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Korea’s beloved comedian and favorite big sister figure talks sex, relationships and celebrity life. And she’s sassier and dirtier than ever before.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Mea Culpa
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Raw and outspoken, comedian Alexis de Anda bares her soul about weddings, exercise, sex, gynecologists, drugs and much more in this stand-up special.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Thiago Ventura: POKAS
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: In a rollicking special, Thiago Ventura jokes about life in the hood, social issues and more, explaining how actions speak louder than words.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Coco y Raulito: Carrusel de ternura
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: A study in contrasts, comedy partners and good friends Coco Celis and Raúl Meneses alternate separate stand-up sets for double the laughs.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Luciano Mellera: Infantiloide
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Argentina's Luciano Mellera emphasizes the humorous and fantastical aspects of childhood through comedic impersonations and insights on daily life.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Natalia Valdebenito: El especial
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: A Chilean comedian fuses activism with irreverence for a stand-up set filled with jokes about misogyny, reproductive rights and respecting women.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Ricardo Quevedo: Los amargados somos más
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: From how social media can ruin relationships to the perils of buying a gift for a woman, comic Ricardo Quevedo dissects life's trials and tribulations.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Enissa Amani: Ehrenwort
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Live from Hamburg, Iranian-German comedian Enissa Amani shares her take on German engineering, tax deductions and online fan-mail etiquette.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Demetri Martin: The Overthinker
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: With his signature one-liners and drawings, Demetri Martin muses on doughnut holes, dogs, sports bars, the alphabet's most aggressive letters and more.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Pete Davidson: Alive From New York
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Comedian and "SNL" star Pete Davidson drops a candid and intimate stand-up special shot live in New York City.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Felipe Neto: My Life Makes No Sense
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: YouTube sensation Felipe Neto brings the stories from his autobiographical book "Não Faz Sentido!" to the stage in this comedy special.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Fred Armisen: Standup For Drummers
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: For an audience of drummers, comedian Fred Armisen shares and demonstrates his thoughts on musical genres, drummer quirks, regional accents and more.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Norm Macdonald: Hitler's Dog, Gossip & Trickery
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: In this new stand-up special, Norm Macdonald delivers sly, deadpan observations from an older -- and perhaps even wiser -- point of view.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Reggie Watts: Spatial
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: The comic innovator delivers a surreal set blending experimental songs, jokes about grits, guns and drugs, and other improvised comedy adventures.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Ryan Hamilton: Happy Face
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Small-town import Ryan Hamilton charms New York with folksy comic observations on big-city life, hot-air ballooning and going to Disney World alone.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Maria Bamford: The Special Special Special
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Spend an evening with gleeful, oh-so-awkward Maria Bamford via her cozy, shot-at-home comedy special, which has a two-person audience: her parents.
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.starring: Maria Bamford, Wayne Federman, Jackie Kashian

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Rory Scovel Tries Stand-Up for the First Time
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Comedian Rory Scovel storms the stage in Atlanta, where he shares unfocused thoughts about things that mystify him, relationships and the "Thong Song."

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Jeff Dunham: Minding the Monsters
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Jeff Dunham returns with a haunted house full of his hysterical entourage, and each character stars in its own horror movie trailer.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Miranda Sings Live…Your Welcome
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Viral video star Miranda Sings and her real-world alter ego Colleen Ballinger share the stage in a special packed with music, comedy and "magichinry."

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Jeff Garlin: Our Man In Chicago
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Comedian Jeff Garlin (unintentionally) celebrates his 37th year of stand-up and shares his learnings on love, loss, success and food addiction.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Jeff Dunham's Very Special Christmas Special
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Politically incorrect, sometimes raunchy ventriloquist Jeff Dunham is joined by his irreverent cast of characters in this hilarious Christmas special.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Ralphie May: Imperfectly Yours
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Comedian Ralphie May takes to the Las Vegas stage with his raw, rollicking take on men's fashion, racism, sex and even waffles. Filmed live in 2013.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Spiritual House
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Psychic Hiroyuki Ehara leads various celebrities through spiritual consultations, probing into their issues and spotlighting their accomplishments.
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.starring: Hiroyuki Ehara, Miki Sumiyoshi, Sato Kondo

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Yoo Byung Jae: Too Much Information
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: "Saturday Night Live Korea" writer-turned-comedian Yoo Byung-jae lays bare his childhood memories and philosophy on sex in his first stand-up venture.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Fakkah Fuzz: Almost Banned
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Stand-up comic Fakkah Fuzz mines cross-cultural humor from the experience of growing up as an outspoken Malay man in Singapore.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Yoo Byung Jae: Discomfort Zone
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Daring comedian Yoo Byung-jae connects criticism he's received from the general public to some of the most touchy issues in current Korean society.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Bill Burr: Let It Go
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: The musings of comedian Bill Burr are let loose in this special, which was filmed at the historic Fillmore Auditorium in San Francisco.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Bill Burr: I'm Sorry You Feel That Way
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Bill Burr escapes the zombie apocalypse, explores how rom-coms ruin great sex and explains how too many childhood hugs may be the downfall of man.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Tom Segura: Completely Normal
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Levelheaded stand-up Tom Segura shares offhand appraisals on hotels and opens up about his hobbies and digestive ailments in this comedy special.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Joan Rivers: Don't Start with Me
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: At 78, Joan Rivers has no interest in slowing down, and no one's immune from her caustic barbs in this stand-up special.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Bill Burr: You People Are All the Same
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Funnyman Bill Burr takes the stage to uncork a profanity-laced, incisive routine that pokes fun at plastic surgery, reality TV, gold diggers and more.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Marc Maron: End Times Fun
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Marc Maron wades through a swamp of vitamin hustlers, evangelicals and grown male nerd children, culminating in a gleefully filthy end-times fantasy.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Marc Maron: Too Real
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Battle-scarred stand-up comedian Marc Maron unleashes a storm of ideas about meditation, mortality, documentary films and our weird modern world.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Anthony Jeselnik: Thoughts and Prayers
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: There's no subject too dark as the comedian skewers taboos and riffs on national tragedies before pulling back the curtain on his provocative style.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Russell Peters: Almost Famous
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: The comic comes home to Toronto to sound off on cultural quirks, kids' furniture and bathroom visits, reveling in all things ridiculously human.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Jim Jefferies : BARE
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Nothing is sacred in this show from Australian comic Jim Jefferies, whether it’s the mother of his child, auditioning disabled actors, or gun control.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Aziz Ansari: Buried Alive
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: "Parks and Recreation" star Aziz Ansari takes the stage to share his unfiltered views on adulthood, babies, marriage, love and more in the modern era.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Bert Kreischer: Hey Big Boy
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Ever the stand-up party animal, comic Bert Kreischer riffs on parenting and family life, being a gun and pet owner, his dad discovering pot, and more.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Marc Maron: Thinky Pain
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Alternative comic Marc Maron is back on stage in New York to talk Chinese food, drug abuse, sex in hotel rooms and life with his girlfriend.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Lynne Koplitz: Hormonal Beast
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Unabashed comedian Lynne Koplitz offers a woman's take on being crazy, the benefits of childlessness and the three things all men really want.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Jim Jefferies: Intolerant
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Between scenes from an excruciating date, Jim Jefferies digs into generational differences, his own bad habits and the shifting boundaries in comedy.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Jen Kirkman: I'm Gonna Die Alone (And I Feel Fine)
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Jen Kirkman delivers some sharp, hilarious truths about divorce, kids, sex and turning 40 in this Netflix original comedy special.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Urzila Carlson: Overqualified Loser
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Stand-up comedian Urzila Carlson keeps the crowd roaring with her thoughts on recasting "The Biggest Loser," sex tape regrets and boxed wine hangovers.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Aziz Ansari Live at Madison Square Garden
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Stand-up comedian and TV star Aziz Ansari ("Parks and Recreation") delivers his sharp-witted take on immigrants, relationships and the food industry.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Christina P: Mother Inferior
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Christina Pazsitzky hits Seattle with a biting dose of reality, telling truths about her childhood, getting older and the horrors of giving birth.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Jen Kirkman: Just Keep Livin’?
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Incisive comic Jen Kirkman gets real about women's bodies, the value of alone time and an Italian private tour guide who may have been a ghost.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Jack Whitehall: At Large
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Comedian Jack Whitehall takes the stage to tell stories about drinking, drugs, a Google Maps van and his ongoing rivalry with Robert Pattinson.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Nikki Glaser: Bangin’
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Nikki Glaser bares all in a blistering stand-up special about sex, sobriety and getting over her own insecurities. And she won't spare you the details.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Whitney Cummings: Can I Touch It?
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: In her fourth stand-up special, Whitney Cummings returns to her hometown of Washington, D.C., and riffs on modern feminism, technology and more.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Iliza Shlesinger: Unveiled
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Here comes the bride, and she's got plenty to say. Newlywed Iliza Shlesinger dissects wedding traditions as she mines her nuptials for laughs.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Jerry Seinfeld: 23 Hours To Kill
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Jerry Seinfeld takes the stage in New York and tackles talking vs. texting, bad buffets vs. so-called "great" restaurants and the magic of Pop Tarts.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Iliza Shlesinger: Confirmed Kills
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: The stand-up sensation tackles TV's "Shark Tank," what it means to be a woman and how to deal with the lawless party goblin that lives in us all.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Bert Kreischer: The Machine
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: From his run-in with a grizzly bear to partying with the Russian mafia, the shirtless comic returns with laugh-out-loud tales in this stand-up special.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Sebastian Maniscalco: What's Wrong with People?
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: With his uproarious tirade on modern behavior and decorum, the popular comic tackles the question we've all asked in this hilarious standup special.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Mo Amer: The Vagabond
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Arab-American comedian Mo Amer recounts his life as a refugee comic, from traveling with the name Mohammed to his long path to citizenship.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Kevin Hart: Seriously Funny
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: With his unique hip-hop style delivery, African American stand-up comedian Kevin Hart expounds on life at a sold-out concert performance.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Sebastian Maniscalco: Stay Hungry
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Sebastian Maniscalco brings an acerbically unique approach to peacocks on planes, life hacks, rich in-laws and life's annoyances in this comedy special.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Colin Quinn: The New York Story
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: The "SNL" veteran performs his off-Broadway show about the history of New York and the people who shape its personality. Directed by Jerry Seinfeld.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Russell Peters vs. the World
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: A four-part docu-series that's an exclusive, backstage pass to global comedy superstar Russell Peters' record-breaking "Notorious" world tour.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Frank Elstner: Just One Last Question
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: In his farewell show, legendary German host Frank Elstner digs deep and savors his discussions with stars such as Daniel Brühl and Lena Meyer-Landrut.
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.starring: Klaas Heufer-Umlauf, Joko Winterscheidt, Lena Meyer-Landrut

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Devlok with Devdutt Pattanaik
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Through chats with host Rasika Dugal, mythologist Devdutt Pattanaik explores the meaning and modern-day relevance of Indian folklore and philosophy.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: My Life My Story
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Host RJ Anmol conducts in-depth interviews with prominent Indian celebrities, who share the stories that lie behind their successes and failures.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Bert Kreischer: Secret Time
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Shirtless comic Bert Kreischer relays personal secrets and stories about being a cool -- if not always responsible -- dad in this stand-up special.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Arango y Sanint: Ríase el show
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Colombian stand-up comedians Antonio Sanint and Julián Arango impersonate an Argentine visitor and a cabbie, and a pair of dirty old men at the opera.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: ADAM SANDLER 100% FRESH
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: From "Heroes" to "Ice Cream Ladies" -- Adam Sandler's comedy special hits you with new songs and jokes in an unexpected, groundbreaking way.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Seth Rogen's Hilarity for Charity
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Seth Rogen and friends combine stand-up, sketches and music for an outrageous comedy special that could only come from the mind of Seth.
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.starring: Seth Rogen, Ike Barinholtz, Michael Che

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Kevin Hart: I'm a Grown Little Man
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Stand-up comedy star Kevin Hart delivers his unique perspective on work, race, family and friends with this laugh-riot comedy show.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Adam Devine: Best Time of Our Lives
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Frenetic comic Adam Devine talks teen awkwardness, celebrity encounters, his "Pitch Perfect" audition and more in a special from his hometown of Omaha.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Chris D'Elia: No Pain
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Chris D'Elia takes the stage in Minneapolis to offer his thoughts on everything from self-censorship to problematic dolphins to lame mutant powers.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Jeff Dunham: All Over the Map
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: America's most beloved ventriloquist hits the road, bringing along all of his most popular pals, including Achmed, Peanut and Walter.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Tim Allen: Men Are Pigs
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Standup comedian Tim Allen delivers a set dedicated to "men stuff" like lawn care, power tools and why he grunts like an animal.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Tim Allen: ReWires America
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Standup star Tim Allen storms the stage for a set chock-full of observations about powerful cars, beautiful lawns and more of the things he loves.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Daniel Sosa: Sosafado
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Comedian Daniel Sosa inhabits various characters, including a Tupperware dealer, a thirsty priest and a Trojan horse soldier in this stand-up special.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Fadily Camara : La plus drôle de tes copines
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Irrepressible French comedian Fadily Camara weaves jokes, vivid characters and physical comedy into a lively stand-up show at La Cigale in Paris.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Marco Luque: Tamo Junto
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Eclectic character comedian Marco Luque plays himself in this stand-up special about relationships, regional differences and his own love of movies.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Martin Matte: La vie, la mort...eh la la..!
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Quebecois comedy star Martin Matte serves up embarrassing personal stories, a solution for social media trolls and more in this unpredictable special.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Jerry Seinfeld: I'm Telling You for the Last Time
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Months after his classic TV sitcom ends, the legendary comic returns to his stand-up roots to deliver his best jokes on a sold-out international tour.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Jerry Before Seinfeld
Stand-Up & Talk Shows.description: Jerry Seinfeld returns to the club that gave him his start in the 1970s, mixing iconic jokes with stories from his childhood and early days in comedy.

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Mike Epps: Don't Take It Personal

Stand-Up & Talk Shows.title: Sommore: Chandelier Status
